channel.title: Dns on Office 365 blog
channel.description: Recent content in Dns on Office 365 blog

item.title: Get a free custom domain for Office 365/Azure AD from www.myo365.site!
item.description: Did you know that you could get a free custom domain for your Office 365 or Azure AD tenant?

item.title: Create DNS records for Office 365 using PowerShell
item.description: If you are using Microsoft DNS for Office 365 DNS records, you can create the required records easily with PowerShell.

item.title: Using PowerShell profile to connect to Office 365
item.description: PowerShell profile makes connecting to Office 365 a lot easier!
